ThingDef.label: SCP-ES-019
ThingDef.description:
Item #: SCP-ES-019 Object Class: Safe
SCP-ES-019 has the appearance of a pair of wireless headphones with AM/FM radio, also incorporating a red and black MP3 player, brand and year of issue unknown. SCP-ES-019 has the peculiarity that, when tuned to any AM-FM frequency, different transmissions are perceived randomly. The duration of these transmissions are completely unpredictable, varying from a few seconds to [REDACTED] consecutive hours.
A side effect of SCP-ES-019, displayed in approximately [REDACTED]% of the subjects who listen to the broadcasts for at least thirty seconds, is a conviction in and focus on avoiding said catastrophes by preventing the occurrence of preceding events by either: killing a person before their birth; destroying an artifact before it becomes a threat; or [DATA EXPUNGED].
